perturbation.original_text: 4.4 RESTAURANT  MANAGER.  At all times during the Term of this  Agreement, Franchisee shall employ at least one (1) individual (the  "Restaurant  Manager") who is  responsible  for the direct,  personal  supervision  of the  Franchise d Restaurant .
perturbation.changed_text: 4.4 RESTAURANT  STAFF.  At all times during the Term of this  Agreement, Franchisee shall ensure there is adequate restaurant staff who is responsible for the functioning of the Franchised Restaurant.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies the need for a 'Restaurant Manager,' implying a specific role and potentially specific qualifications. The modified version uses the term 'restaurant staff,' broadening the scope and potentially allowing the Franchisee to fulfill the requirement with any personnel, thus undermining the quality expectations implied by the original term.

perturbation.original_text: 5.4   SIGNS.  The Burger King Marks will be  displayed  only in the manner and at such  locations  as are  authorized  by BKC.  The  Franchisee  agrees  to maintain and display signs conforming to the Current Image. The Franchisee shall discontinue the use of and destroy such signs as are declared obsolete by BKC.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.4   SIGNAGE.  The Burger King Marks will be  displayed in the manner that the Franchisee deems most beneficial to brand recognition.  The  Franchisee  agrees  to display approved signage conforming to a reasonably current image. The Franchisee may maintain usage of signs that have not been updated without written approval from BKC.
perturbation.explanation: The original text uses 'Signs' and enforce that The Franchisee should follow BKC and its Current Image. The modified version is changing it to Signage giving Franchisee more leeway to do as they 'deem' best. The franchisee also does not need any approval to use old signs, conflicting with the earlier term.

perturbation.original_text: 9.1.1 PAYMENT OF ROYALTY.  Except as otherwise provided in Section 5 3 of the   Development Agreement, by the fifteenth (15th) day of each month, the Franchisee  shall deliver to BKC a return of Gross Sales for the preceding month and pay to BKC or its designee a royalty for the use of the Burger King Marks an the Burger  King  System  calculated  by applying  the  percentage  set forth in SCHEDULE  1  against  the Gross  Sales for the  preceding  calendar  month.
perturbation.changed_text: 9.1.1 PAYMENT OF ROYALTY.  Except as otherwise provided in Section 5 3 of the   Development Agreement, by the fifteenth (15th) day of each month, the Franchisee  shall deliver to BKC a return of Gross Sales for the preceding month and pay to BKC or its designee a fee for the use of the Burger King Marks an the Burger  King  System  calculated  by applying  a fluctuating percentage against the Gross Sales for the preceding  month.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies that the Royalty payment is calulated by applying the percentage set forth in SCHEDULE 1; whereas, the changed text states the royalty payment is calculated by applying a fluctuating percentage. In essence, the changed term creates an in-text contradiction.
